TEXT.English: %s1_CivName are trying to form their own country. What shall we do?
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_CivName正在试图建立自己的国家。我们应该怎么办?

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Just ignore them, nobody would want to leave our mighty Empire.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Do nothing; only rely on your stability and the passive military presence in the city: %d1_RawOdds % chance to stop the rebels.
TEXT.Chinese: [BOLD]Just ignore them, nobody would want to leave our mighty Empire.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Do nothing; only rely on your stability and the passive military presence in the city: %d1_RawOdds % chance to stop the rebels.

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Form a crackdown of the rebellion and subjugate those rebels.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Suppress with force; your military might and the number of units in the city also greatly contributes to your chances, but this action will anger the general population: %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels, but it will generate unhappiness and causes 1 turn of revolt if succeeds.
TEXT.Chinese: [BOLD]Form a crackdown of the rebellion and subjugate those rebels.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Suppress with force; your military might and the number of units in the city also greatly contributes to your chances, but this action will anger the general population: %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels, but it will generate unhappiness and causes 1 turn of revolt if succeeds.

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Bribe the local Lords, the rebels have less chance to take your city without their support.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Send in your envoys; your financial contribution adjusted by your government form also contributes to your chances, but it will anger the rebel militia further: %d3_Odds % chance to stop the rebels, but it costs you %d1_Gold [ICON_GOLD] (full bribe = %d2_Bribe), and more attacking rebel units appear if succeeds.
TEXT.Chinese: [BOLD]Bribe the local Lords, the rebels have less chance to take your city without their support.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Send in your envoys; your financial contribution adjusted by your government form also contributes to your chances, but it will anger the rebel militia further: %d3_Odds % chance to stop the rebels, but it costs you %d1_Gold [ICON_GOLD] (full bribe = %d2_Bribe), and more attacking rebel units appear if succeeds.

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Do whatever it takes to keep them.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Apply both military and financial measures: %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels, with the combined effects of the 2 options above.
TEXT.Chinese: [BOLD]Do whatever it takes to keep them.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Apply both military and financial measures: %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels, with the combined effects of the 2 options above.

TEXT.English: Thanks to god the revolt was unsuccessful, the city of %s1 remained in our hands. Now we only need to get rid of those barbaric rebels!
TEXT.Chinese: Thanks to god the revolt was unsuccessful, the city of %s1 remained in our hands. Now we only need to get rid of those barbaric rebels!

TEXT.English: The %s1 revolt was successful, the city of %s2 has declared it's independence!
TEXT.Chinese: The %s1 revolt was successful, the city of %s2 has declared it's independence!

TEXT.English: Rumours arrived at your palace that massive barbarian hordes had emerged in the east, and they are already closing to your neighbours.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It is said that their first raging armies will probably arrive near your borders in a couple years (5-10 turns).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]While you are quite sure that those stories must be exaggerated, maybe it would be wise to strengthen your defences, just in case?
TEXT.Chinese: Rumours arrived at your palace that massive barbarian hordes had emerged in the east, and they are already closing to your neighbours.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It is said that their first raging armies will probably arrive near your borders in a couple years (5-10 turns).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]While you are quite sure that those stories must be exaggerated, maybe it would be wise to strengthen your defences, just in case?

TEXT.English: Your spies report that a dangerous warlord called Tamerlane gathers a mighty force in the east, planning huge conquests.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It might even bring danger to you too, possibly arriving at your borders in a couple years (5-10 turns). Make sure that your nation is prepared!
TEXT.Chinese: Your spies report that a dangerous warlord called Tamerlane gathers a mighty force in the east, planning huge conquests.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It might even bring danger to you too, possibly arriving at your borders in a couple years (5-10 turns). Make sure that your nation is prepared!

TEXT.English: Good news! It seems that the worst part of the %s1 invasions are finally over.
TEXT.Chinese: Good news! It seems that the worst part of the %s1 invasions are finally over.
